availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Long (Eddyville (lyon co) tailor, caldwell co. farmer. )

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, tailor. Virginia native. Married to Mariah Goodall Long in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on June 2, 1827. Father of William H. Long, Virginia R. Long, and James S. Long. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Tailor in Eddyville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 326B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 771.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 20.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Lyon County Administration Bonds, 1830-1869; Vol 19-20, 1970-1975, p. 48.
